paper_abstract: This paper describes the IKEv2 protocol and presents how an open-source IKEv2 implementation, in particular OpenIKEv2 has been designed and implemented. All the issues found during this process and how they were solved are also described. Finally, a comparison between existing open-source implementations is presented.
paper_title: OpenIKEv2: Design and implementation of an IKEv2 solution
